name: I'd Dread to Think
description:
Entry for the Mini Jam 83: Dread. The theme was dread and dice had to be a core mechanic. Made by BunnyChop and KiraFarron.

I'd Dread to Think is a narrative-driven point-and-click game about grudges, looking back and moving forward. Created in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 83: Dread.

Leave us a comment and tell us which choices you made.

SFX

Train ambience by gryc

Dice throw by Kenney

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/
